text: Genyorchis platybulbon is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is native to Cameroon and Gabon.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. == Sources == * platybulbon Category:Orchids of Cameroon Category:Orchids of Gabon Category:Plants described in 1906 Category:Critically endangered flora of Africa Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Genyorchis platybulbon
